title: DFG R.I.P ??
body: Do you think DeathFire Grasp should be removed?

replies.body: They are catering to the less skilled by removing the item that lets people use point and clicks to 100 - 0 people? I'm sure that is detrimental to the unskilled actually...

riots reasoning behind removing it are well placed and thought out.

its stat placements are really good and it being one of the 3 items with over 100AP (without it being conditional to get over 100AP) means those parts should remain in some new form. but the active is a crutch.

If the damn active is op then get rid of the active not the whole damn thing. Well thought out my left foot. I lose faith with riot with every patch. the last one was alright but they are making me start to hate the game and I'm not the only one. Riot are catering to the less skilled and making the game less fun. Mages need {{item:3128}} the cooldown and the ap it's perfect. If they want more diversity bring out more items the are on the same level. they only have this problem since the made all tanks health based and took away one of the anti tank weapons. they lowered magic resistance so of course mages are going to start hitting harder. At this rate they will have to change their name to league of the reasonably strong. Because there an't many legends left in the league and it looks like the mages are next.
I never used it anyway, I'm not going to miss it.
i think dfg should be reworked into a toggle/active that causes next spell to do additional damage/reduce MR
